name: Job Race
overview: It is the year 3486. You play the role of an unemployed person, which isn't a rare problem these days. Like every evening, you read the newspaper, the Ghetto-Gazetto, and see an advertisement of the publishing company Cinort-Galrey, offering a job as endboss for a planned game. The aim is to pass all nine levels with your five vehicles to reach the company. The task is (of course) not too easy. So enter your O.S.-GTUm which is a very common small nuclear care these days. It has got an automatically working speed device, but unfortunately, yours was broken two days ago... Developed by Ulrich Mühl for Paravision and published in Compute mit 1987/02.
